title: Hot, dry weather likely to persist in most parts of country
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 11 (APP): The Pakistan Meteoroligical Department (PMD) Tuesday forecast that hot and dry weather was likely to prevail in most plain areas of the country during next 24 hours.
Rain-wind-thunderstorm was expected at isolated places in Pothohar region, upper Punjab, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Upper Sindh, Kashmir and Gilgit Baltistan, the PMD said.
Maximum temperatures ( in Â°C) recorded on Tuesday were: Sibbi, Shaheed Benazirabad, Dadu and Mohenjo-Daro 44, and Rahim Yar Khan, Bahawalnagar, Padidan and Jacobabad 43.
